pullrequest.title: Disabled loading/cleanup of globals into builtins, ready for it to be moved to runmanager

content.raw:
Updated with latest suggested changes.

Tested with both old and new runmanager versions.

Tested presence and absence of both globals and device objects in main script and imported module within that script.

Everything works as expected.
